languages.text: "Я слышал{mf||а}, медикарии часто проводят вскрытия парой — один режет, другой документирует. Возьмите напарника, Кляйн".
"I have heard that medicae officers often perform autopsies in pairs — one cuts up the body, the other records the findings. You should get a partner, Klein."
languages.original_text: "Я слышал{mf||а}, медикарии часто проводят вскрытия парой — один режет, другой документирует. Возьмите напарника, Кляйн".

traits.locale_text: "I have heard that medicae officers often perform autopsies in pairs — one cuts up the body, the other records the findings. You should get a partner, Klein."
"I have heard that medicae officers often perform autopsies in pairs — one cuts up the body, the other records the findings. You should get a partner, Klein."
"I have heard that medicae officers often perform autopsies in pairs — one cuts up the body, the other records the findings. You should get a partner, Klein."
"I have heard that medicae officers often perform autopsies in pairs — one cuts up the body, the other records the findings. You should get a partner, Klein."
"I have heard that medicae officers often perform autopsies in pairs — one cuts up the body, the other records the findings. You should get a partner, Klein."
"I have heard that medicae officers often perform autopsies in pairs — one cuts up the body, the other records the findings. You should get a partner, Klein."

languages.text: « J'ai entendu dire que les officiers de la medicae réalisent souvent des autopsies à quatre mains, l'un se chargeant de disséquer la victime pendant que l'autre consigne ses observations. Vous devriez vous trouver un partenaire, Klein. »
languages.original_text: "I have heard that medicae officers often perform autopsies in pairs — one cuts up the body, the other records the findings. You should get a partner, Klein."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai entendu dire que les officiers de la medicae réalisent souvent des autopsies à quatre mains, l'un se chargeant de disséquer la victime pendant que l'autre consigne ses observations. Vous devriez vous trouver un partenaire, Klein. »

languages.text: «He oído que los oficiales de medicae suelen realizar autopsias en pareja, con uno abriendo el cuerpo y el otro anotando los resultados. Debería buscarse un compañero, Klein».
languages.original_text: "I have heard that medicae officers often perform autopsies in pairs — one cuts up the body, the other records the findings. You should get a partner, Klein."

traits.locale_text: «He oído que los oficiales de medicae suelen realizar autopsias en pareja, con uno abriendo el cuerpo y el otro anotando los resultados. Debería buscarse un compañero, Klein».

languages.text: “我听说医务官经常互相搭档进行尸检，一个人负责解剖尸体，另一个人负责记录结果。你应该找个搭档，克莱因。”
languages.original_text: "I have heard that medicae officers often perform autopsies in pairs — one cuts up the body, the other records the findings. You should get a partner, Klein."

traits.locale_text: “我听说医务官经常互相搭档进行尸检，一个人负责解剖尸体，另一个人负责记录结果。你应该找个搭档，克莱因。”

languages.text: 「メディケア・オフィサーは二人組で解剖を行うと聞いた。一人は遺体の解剖をし、もう一人が記録を書く。クライン、パートナーを見つけるべきだ」
languages.original_text: "I have heard that medicae officers often perform autopsies in pairs — one cuts up the body, the other records the findings. You should get a partner, Klein."

traits.locale_text: 「メディケア・オフィサーは二人組で解剖を行うと聞いた。一人は遺体の解剖をし、もう一人が記録を書く。クライン、パートナーを見つけるべきだ」

languages.text: "Ich habe gehört, dass Medicae-Offiziere Autopsien oft zu zweit ausführen. Der eine seziert den Leichnam, der andere protokolliert die Erkenntnisse. Ihr solltet Euch einen Partner suchen, Klein."
languages.original_text: "I have heard that medicae officers often perform autopsies in pairs — one cuts up the body, the other records the findings. You should get a partner, Klein."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe gehört, dass Medicae-Offiziere Autopsien oft zu zweit ausführen. Der eine seziert den Leichnam, der andere protokolliert die Erkenntnisse. Ihr solltet Euch einen Partner suchen, Klein."

languages.text: "Sıhhiye subaylarının otopsileri sıklıkla ortaklaşa yaptıklarını duymuştum. Bir tanesi cesedi kesip incelerken diğeri bulguları not alıyormuş. Yanına birini daha almalısın Klein."
languages.original_text: "I have heard that medicae officers often perform autopsies in pairs — one cuts up the body, the other records the findings. You should get a partner, Klein."
